TopicTitle: [WIP][1.9.x-1.12.x] Scatterer-atmospheric scattering (0.0838 - 14/08/2022) Scattering improvements, in-game atmo generation and multi-sun support

Articles.Content:
> 
> i having the issue parts are purple
> [http://i.imgur.com/Mh4K1hK.png](http://i.imgur.com/Mh4K1hK.png)
> 
> and this
> 
> [http://i.imgur.com/pHuFypT.png](http://i.imgur.com/pHuFypT.png)

Fix is in the previous page:

> 
> For everyone getting the pink missing textures thing just download an old version of scatterer and stick the "replacement shaders" folder into the new version, that should fix it for now. This will get you back to the old low-res terrain, if you don't want low-res just don't replace any of the shaders that have PQS in the name.

Reported working by proot. I'll add it to the OP or make a fixed version later, please stop reporting bugs that have fixes or that have already been reported a lot.

Is this the space engine forums? Or the KSP forums? I'm so confused now........

>

> <iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/SEIDep_UMmk?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

> **Wonderful, wondelful job Blackrack.**
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Some notes: dx9, win 8.1, core to quad
> 
> 
> 
> - This is a mix of the actual state of KSPRC (wip-EVE, DOE, PS & TR) + lattest scatterer. Without fine tunning yet.
> 
> 
> 
> - Pink textures solved with your tip
> 
> 
> 
> - Atmo is working in map view, clouds are visible but the surface of the planet not (sometimes this view show the wrong flare -the inside atmo one, instead the stock one-, sometimes the atmo appears behind the planet or a bit displaced from it).
> 
> 
> 
> - Clouds are visible now, yes, but the scattering still overlaps the clouds layers if you look them in the horizon. This same problem appeared in the first stages of development of wip-EVE, so probably Rbray89 knows a solution for that.
> 
> 
> 
> This and EVE should be brethren mods.

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/8iwBM_YB1sE?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
yo man i just wanna say, [snip] if you would like share your files that you used to get the game looking that pretty, I swear i'll name my first born son after you.

Ah, it's the old "name my first born after you" strategy...

Well I DL's the .014 (.14, whatever) and replaced the files in the folder mentioned (and only replaced files that diddn't have PQS in the filename. That fixed the pink issue. Turning off anisotropic filtering did the trick on the ground with the lines (grid lines?). But it made Kerbin from orbit look like an old CRT monitor display (alternating light & dark horizontal lines) as well as weird effects that look like irregularly shaped concentric rings centered around the focus of your POV.

Where can Scatterer version .014 be downloaded?

Addendum: Found it! Great mod!

Hi, everyone, just reporting some pink issues.

I just tried the new version 0.015 and it seemed much better than the previous version. However, I found some part and building become pink like those ones above.

It seemed the Old cockpit Memorial become pink in my case.

![screenshot306.png](http://i905.photobucket.com/albums/ac257/liweih/Kerbal%20Space%20Program%20Gameplay/screenshot306.png)

(see the little pink dot in the left middle?)

And some stock parts, for example, the 2.5m ore tank.

![screenshot334.png](http://i905.photobucket.com/albums/ac257/liweih/Kerbal%20Space%20Program%20Gameplay/screenshot334.png)

Also the interior of the Hitchhiker Storage Container become pink.

![screenshot335.png](http://i905.photobucket.com/albums/ac257/liweih/Kerbal%20Space%20Program%20Gameplay/screenshot335.png)

I'm not sure which part will becomes pink, the storage bays and the fairings are fine for me. Both mod parts and stock parts have some pinky issue. The wheel of RoveMax Model XL3 is pink now.

The mod I'm using: EVE, AVP, TP, Distant Object, Stock Revamp and some other stuffs.

> 
> Hi, everyone, just reporting some pink issues.

Already reported/answered previously;

> 
> For everyone getting the pink missing textures thing just download an old version of scatterer and stick the "replacement shaders" folder into the new version, that should fix it for now. This will get you back to the old low-res terrain, if you don't want low-res just don't replace any of the shaders that have PQS in the name.

> 
> Where can Scatterer version .014 be downloaded?
> Addendum: Found it! Great mod!

> [http://puu.sh/hPkQs/a527eb5763.jpg](http://puu.sh/hPkQs/a527eb5763.jpg) It also has that black circle around the sun in Map view.

Looks like I forgot to disable the effectin mapview (it's useless anyway, it's just the atmosphere you see at the edges of the planet).

It's funny because now that I've been editing textures and getting involved with EVE/Scatterer/KSPRC, I've been more able to help out the new members with difficulties haha. I hope it's not annoying. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

But anyhoo, next week will be pretty light on my schedule and so I should be able to continue helping and experimenting with mixing the three.
